author: Josh Gerstein
title: Barr says bail decisions should consider virus risks
description: Each new prisoner increases danger for jailers and fellow inmates, the attorney general tells prosecutors.
content: Asked about what he was doing to protect prisoners, Trump turned the question around, criticizing state and local officials who have ordered releases of some inmates in a bid to lower prison populations and lessen the impact of the virus. He also seemed to bo… [+1578 chars]
